users.sample_text_corpus: I enjoy writing technical documentation and blog posts about machine learning. My writing style is clear and concise, often using examples to illustrate complex concepts.

users.natural_language_description: A data analyst who prefers formal, technical language and often works with financial data and statistical reports.

users.sample_text_corpus: Our quarterly results show strong growth in the European market. We need to focus on expanding our product line and improving customer satisfaction scores.
users.natural_language_description: A business manager who communicates in a professional, results-oriented manner and frequently discusses metrics and strategic initiatives.

users.sample_text_corpus: Yo, that new game drop was fire! I stayed up all night grinding XP. Gotta hit level 50 before my crew does. Also, my math homework? Crushed it. Easy dubs.
users.natural_language_description: A playful, energetic kid who uses slang, emojis, and casual language. Loves games, school banter, and speaking with enthusiasm and humor. Style is modern, expressive, and informal.
